newsitem.title: SPAIN: Madrid bourse suspends trade in Cantabrico.
newsitem.headline: Madrid bourse suspends trade in Cantabrico.

text.p: Trade in Spanish electricity firm Hidrocantabrico shares were suspended, the Madrid stock exchange commission CNMV said on Monday.
Earlier today, the CNMV also suspended trade in Electra de Viesgo and Saltos del Nansa pending further information on press reports.
The reports said Cantabrico was studying purchases of Electra de Viesgo and Saltos del Nansa from Endesa.

The CNMV also said earlier the bourse had suspended trade in Electricidad de Sevillana and in Fuerzas Electricas de Catalunya (Fecsa). Endesa is launching a buy offer for up to 75 percent of the two groups.
Neither Endesa nor Cantabrico was available for comment.
